result.eng: I liked him very much and we never fell out.
result.ga: Thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamh
result.orig: Thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamh
result.html: Thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamhI liked him very much and we never fell out.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaitin sé go mór liom agus níor ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile riaṁI liked him very much and we never fell out.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
